amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide $1.2 billion in funding to the Low Income Home Energy Assistance program (LIHEAP) and offset that increase by reducing by 2 percent discretionary spending in each account on a pro rata basis.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of July 31, as amendment No. 18, to appropriate 2% of the total amount of Titles 1-4, to carry out title XXVI of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1981.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blute amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 53 - 367, 3 Present (Roll no. 621).
